task.summary: Default task
create Account and login working partially
fixed Create Account Bug (SQL email field not long enough), and Session is now working correctly (scripts/setUpSession.pp)
Logout working, fixed multiple bugs, and added checks for validating email addresses
main page done, fixed visual bugs on landing page, design is now fully responsive for Desktop Computers
idk anymore

[login.html/login.css] - fixed loginBox placement and size
[main.html/main.css] - fixed body size issue for some window-sizes

[ajax/sensor_post.php] - added this file to transfer data from the sensorStations to the MySQL Database.
[ajax/getUserData] - added $silent. If true, the script will not echo anything.
[ajax/getContentForUser.php] - added a role check. System.php can now only be displayed if you have role 3 (Administrator)
[includes/main.html] - removes "System" from the sidebar if you are not role 3 (Administrator)

[ajax/login.php] - fixed possible privilege escalation by having multiple accounts with the same email Address (The issue itself will be fixed later on)
[includes/login.html] - removed unnecessary code

[includes/my account.html] - added the file
[resources/css/includes/my account.css] - added the file
[ajax/getContentForUser.php] - added option for "my account"
[ajax/login.php] - fixed possible privilege escalation by having multiple accounts with the same email Address (The issue itself will be fixed later on)

[ajax/updateAccount.php] - added file and check if the ID is set in the session
[includes/my account.html] - aded id's to inputfields
[resources/css/includes/my account.css] - fixed misplaycing of some elements

[ajax/createAccount.php] - added dtRolle in Query at line 27
[ajax/getContentForUser.php] - added option for "Accounts" page
[ajax/getUserData] - removed $conn->close as it leads to errors in other pages
[ajax/listUsers.php] - added File, is used to get a list of all Users, with inormation about them.
[ajax/sensor_post.php] - fixed d standing for double, as it should be a s in line 27
[ajax/updateAccount.php] - added logic to update an Account if a user requests so
[includes/accounts.html] - added Page, is used by Administrators to show a list of all Users with information about them.
[includes/main.html] - added option for "Accounts" page
[includes/my account.html] - made #inputCompanyName disabled, as the user should not be able to change his company - added logic to check if password is changed, as well as feedback on the changeAccount request
[resources/css/includes/accounts.css] - added CSS for "Accounts" page
[test.html] - modified test script according to the changes in /ajax/sensor_post.php

[ajax/createAccount.php] - added close connection and echo json_encode, as it wasnt present before
[ajax/deleteAccount.php] - added the file so an Admin can delete a User
[ajax/getUserData.php] - added more fields and partially renamed them in the output
[ajax/listUsers.php] - added more fields to be returned
[ajax/updateAccount.php] - added functionality and checks for Administrators to edit User Accounts
[includes/accounts.html] - added functionality to create a new account - added functionality to edit an account
[includes/login.html] - create Account option no longer exists
[includes/img/accounts.html/edit.png] - aded file
[includes/img/accounts.html/trash.png] - aded file
[includes/css/includes/accounts.css] - added styles for editing account - added styles for deleting account
[includes/css/login.css] - removed styles for create Account

[/ajax/createAccount.php] - user with Role 2 (company owner) can now create Accounts for its own company
[/ajax/createCompany.php] - added file - gives User Role 3 the ability to create a new company
[/ajax/deleteAccount.php] - added User Role 2 the ability to delete an Account under his company
[/ajax/getContentForUser.php] - added "accounts" page
[/ajax/getUserData.php] - added more fields to output
[/ajax/listCompanies.php] - gives user Role 3 the ability to list all exsting companies
[/ajax/listUser.php] - added ability for user Role 2 to see all Accounts in its company
[/ajax/updateAccount.php] - added ability for User role 2 to update an account under its company
[/resources/css/includes/accounts.css] - fixed CSS for cross browser compatibility
[/resources/css/includes/companies.css] - added CSS for "companies" page
[/resources/css/includes/my account.css] - fixed CSS for cross browser compatibility
[/includes/accounts.html] - fixed a bug where companies could not be selected correctly - better reload of the page
[/includes/companies.html] - added File - gives User role 3 the ability to create and edit companies in the system
[/includes/main.html] - added "companies" in sidebar

[/ajax/createCompany.php] - added check if POST Parameters are set
[/ajax/deleteCompany.php] - added File - gives Administrator the possibility to delete a Company by providing a company's ID
[/ajax/getCompanyData.php] - added File - gives Administrator the ability to get all the Data about a specific company
[/ajax/listUsers.php] - fixed a bug where a user would be listed multiple times if more than one Company exists
[/ajax/updateAccount.php] - Company Owners dont have the possibility to kick a user out of their company anymore
[/ajax/updateCompany.php] - added File - gives Administrators the ability to modify an exisitng Company
[/includes/accounts.html] - fixed a Bug where the value could not be read out of #inputCompanyName
[/includes/companies.html] - added the ability to delete a Company - added the ability to create a new company - added the ability to edit a company - removes static test element
[/resources/css/includes/companies.css] - added all the CSS for the "companies" page

[/ajax/createAccount.php] - Adapted to work in the "My Company" Tab
[/ajax/deleteAccount.php] - Adapted to work in the "My Company" Tab
[/ajax/getCompanyData.php] - fixed possible XSS Attack
[/ajax/getContentForUser.php] - added Checks for "My Company", "Shell" and "Sensor" Tabs
[/ajax/getUserData.php] - fixed possible XSS Attack
[/ajax/listCompanies.php] - fixed possible XSS Attack
[/ajax/Sensors.php] - added File - lists all Sensors in the DB and returns JSON Object
[/ajax/listUsers.php] - Adapted to work in the "My Company" Tab - fixed possible XSS Attack
[/ajax/updateAccount.php] - a user cant edit another user with a higher role anymore
[/includes/accounts.html] - fixed a bug where the user list would not be updated after a Delete action was complete - has new variable "userRole" which stores the users RoleLvl, to remove delete and edit buttons on Users with higher roles - can handle more errors visually now
[/includes/accounts.html] - added handles to work correctly with XSS protection
[/includes/login.html] - changed Path of CSS file
[/includes/main.html] - added "Sensors" Tab
[/includes/my account.html] - added handles to work correctly with XSS protection
[/includes/sensors.html] - added file - lists all Sensors in DB
[/includes/shell.php] - added file - replaces "System" Tab - web shell
[/includes/system.php] - removed file
[/resources/css/includes/companies.css] - fixed misplacing of #createBox and #editBox
[/resources/css/includes/login.css] - moved file from /resources/css
[/resources/css/includes/main.css] - moved file from /resources/css
[/resources/css/includes/sensors.css] - added file - contains all styles for "Sensors" Tab
[/scripts/parseURLForQueries.php] - added file - saves all queries for the URL, a page has been accessed with, in $queries
[/scripts/replaceSpecialChars.php] -added file - replaces "<", ">", " ", "," characters with the HTML charcode

[/ajax/createAccount.php] - added check for page name, to differenciate pages when logged in as Admin
[/ajax/createSensor.php] - added File - gives Admin ability to add a new SensorStation to the System
[/ajax/deleteAccount.php] - Company Owner can only delete Users
[/ajax/deleteCompany.php] - deletes all Users in the company before attempting Company Delete
[/ajax/deleteSensor.php] - added File - gives Admin the ability to remove SensorStation from the System
[/ajax/getSensorData.php] - added File - gives Admin the ability to get information about a SensorStation from the System
[/ajax/listSensors.php] - provided default value "N/A" if a sensor never was online
[/ajax/updateSensor.php] - added File - gives Admin the ability to change attributes for a Sensor
[/includes/accounts.html] - Admin can now edit users of level 2
[/includes/sensors.html] - logic for displaying Sensors and their information
[/resources/css/includes/sensors.css] - css for Sensors page

[/includes/accounts.html] - added mobile style
[/includes/login.html] - added mobile style
[/includes/main.html] - added mobile style
[/includes/my account.html] - added mobile style
[/resources/css/includes/accounts.css] - added mobile style
[/resources/css/includes/login.css] - added mobile style
[/resources/css/includes/main.css] - added mobile style
[/resources/css/includes/my accounts.css] - added mobile style
[/resources/img/main.html/menu.png] - added File - menu icon that shows in mobile style
[/index.php] - added viewport for mobil styles

[/ajax/getUserData.php] - fixed error where field "company" in return Object is always the name of the first Company in Databse
[/ajax/sensor_post.php] - fixed error where 0.0 is not passing as float value check, thus not writing to database
[/includes/companies.html] - mobile version of Website
[/includes/sensors.html] - mobile version of Website
[/resources/css/includes/accounts.css] - mobile version of Website
[/resources/css/includes/companies.css] - mobile version of Website
[/resources/css/includes/main.css] - mobile version of Website
[/resources/css/includes/my account.css] - mobile version of Website
[/resources/css/includes/sensors.css] - mobile version of Website
[/resources/css/includes/sensors.css] - fixed misplacement of last online p tag

[/ajax/getContentForUser.php] - added entry for "My Plants"
[/ajax/sensor_post.php] - added missing "$" in line 6
[/includes/main.html] - added entry for "My Plants"
[/includes/my plants.html] - added file - added static graph for testing

[/ajax/getPlantTelemetry.php] -added functionality for Charts
[/includes/my plants.html] -functionality for viewing charts
[/resources/css/includes] -added CSS for mobile devices

[/ajax/getPlantTelemetry.php] - added Timestamp to $dataArray
[/includes/my plants.html] - switching between different values is now possible - showing timestamps/dates in ChartJS now instead of a counter value
[/resources/css/includes/my plants.css] - added CSS for new selection buttons - TODO: mobile Styles for buttons
[/ajax/deleteAccount.php] - preventing deletion of the same account as thge logged in user
[/ajax/getPkantTelemetry.php] - preventing accessing data outside of the users company
added /includes/shell.php to git repo. It was in the project and live website before but Windows Defender deleted it, so I had to add it again.
[/includes/my plants.html] fixed jumping in time when switching between sensor readings (moirture, temperature, etc)
[/ajax/logout.php] - properly deletes session now
[/ajax/getPlantTelemetry.php] - added 0 values to $response, else the onclick value of the "more info" button in /includes/my plants.html will not be set properly
- trying to fix scrolling issue on mobile WebKit browsers - fixed button placement in infoBox in my plants
fixed scrolling issue by disabling scrolling if any blurbox is shown, and automatically scrolling to top of page
added backend support for modifying sensor station names
load current name into input field in my plants if more info is pressed
added some CSS for the save changes and fixed a possible exploit where names for Sensors that dont belong to the users company could be changed
replaced $_POST with $_GET in /ajax/updateSensor.php fully implemented UI side of changing Sensor name
added notifications.html fixed missing blur view in accounts.css, companies.css and sensors.css
